```{r}
gamma <- str_extract_all(bin, boundary("character"), simplify = TRUE) %>% 
  apply(2, function(x) round(mean(x == "1"))) %>%
  paste(collapse = "") %>% 
  strtoi(base = 2)

epsilon <- 2^12 - 1 - gamma

epsilon * gamma
```
